EmailTemplate.name: 09-30-22 HOS Hurricane Shutdown Procedures 2.HOS Florida Hurricane Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Hurricane Ian Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Across Florida, residents and businesses have been severely impacted by Hurricane Ian. We want you to know that the NCR Aloha family is here to support you. Please reach out to us at 1-888-679-7147 or just reply to this email if we can help you with anything.
If your hardware devices have been damaged by flood waters, do not attempt to turn them on. Reach out to our team and we can help you log your losses for insurance purposes and put together a solution to get your business operational again.
Click here for help. <[[mailto:marketing.hospitality@ncr.com]]>
